Alcyone Station

Due to numerous violent encounters with outlaws in the nearby Deep Fields, G&B struggled to find qualified staff willing to apply for Alcyone Station. The company's last resort was an initiative that promised untrained civilians a pass to the homeworlds if they signed up for a year of service. A cost-effective solution considering that only 63% of all participants ever finished their service alive...

Abandoned Jumpgate

Officially, Zharkov is the last system inhabited by Colonials before the Beltegrades gradually open up to the Okkar homeworlds. But between here and there still lies the infamous Khaït Nebula. Few venture past this point and fewer return. Rumors speak of a strange anomaly, stranger creatures, and madness that befalls anyone who dares to delve too deep into this otherworldly territory.

Abandoned Transit Point

Abidan II

All across the "Wheel" the Okkar patrol the area to discourage smugglers from passing through. The smugglers on the other hand keep on creating elaborate tunnels to avoid being detected. It's a game of cat and mouse that has been going on for many sol cycles and is starting to turn into a local tradition.

Alpha Draco Thermal Plant

The thermal plants of Mota are one of the original Colonial mining interests estabished in 3022, before any major conflict. When the Okkar retaliated a few years later, Mota's stationed personnel were forcibly overworked to increasing Colonial demands. Near the end of the war, the inhabitants of the Alpha Draco claims isloated themselves and formed Zurilia.

Ancient Citadel

Okkar hold great respect towards the ancient civilization they deem as their precursors, yet they leave the ancient sites alone through their great understanding. The Redeemers have tampered with some ancient sites like

the one here, which has forced the hand of certain Okkar orders to intervene begrudgingly.

Ancient Depot

Early explorers had stumbled across similar structures all across the Beltegrades. There was no discernable trace of life for almost a thousand cycles.,and yet all sites were in perfectly good shape as if no time had passed since their initial construction. Scientists of practically every relevant field were deployed - their almost immediate retreat instantly adding to the mystery.
